name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.val_det_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑(Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det A)) (↑A).det
decl:
/-- The determinant of a unit matrix is itself a unit. -/
@[simps]
def det : GL n R →* Rˣ where
  toFun A :=
    { val := (↑A : Matrix n n R).det
      inv := (↑A⁻¹ : Matrix n n R).det
      val_inv := by rw [← det_mul, A.mul_inv, det_one]
      inv_val := by rw [← det_mul, A.inv_mul, det_one] }
  map_one' := Units.ext det_one
  map_mul' _ _ := Units.ext <| det_mul _ _

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.val_inv_det_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det A))) (↑(Inv.inv A)).det
decl:
/-- The determinant of a unit matrix is itself a unit. -/
@[simps]
def det : GL n R →* Rˣ where
  toFun A :=
    { val := (↑A : Matrix n n R).det
      inv := (↑A⁻¹ : Matrix n n R).det
      val_inv := by rw [← det_mul, A.mul_inv, det_one]
      inv_val := by rw [← det_mul, A.inv_mul, det_one] }
  map_one' := Units.ext det_one
  map_mul' _ _ := Units.ext <| det_mul _ _

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.ext_iff
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A B : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Iff (Eq A B) (∀ (i j : n), Eq (↑A i j) (↑B i j))
decl:
theorem ext_iff (A B : GL n R) : A = B ↔ ∀ i j, (A : Matrix n n R) i j = (B : Matrix n n R) i j :=
  Units.ext_iff.trans Matrix.ext_iff.symm

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.ext
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A B : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
h : ∀ (i j : n), Eq (↑A i j) (↑B i j)
⊢ Eq A B
decl:
/-- Not marked `@[ext]` as the `ext` tactic already solves this. -/
theorem ext ⦃A B : GL n R⦄ (h : ∀ i j, (A : Matrix n n R) i j = (B : Matrix n n R) i j) : A = B :=
  Units.ext <| Matrix.ext h

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_mul
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A B : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑(HMul.hMul A B)) (HMul.hMul ↑A ↑B)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_mul : ↑(A * B) = (↑A : Matrix n n R) * (↑B : Matrix n n R) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_one
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
⊢ Eq (↑1) 1
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_one : ↑(1 : GL n R) = (1 : Matrix n n R) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_inv
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv A)) (Inv.inv ↑A)
decl:
theorem coe_inv : ↑A⁻¹ = (↑A : Matrix n n R)⁻¹ :=
  letI := A.invertible
  invOf_eq_nonsing_inv (↑A : Matrix n n R)

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_toLin
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑(Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.toLin A)) (↑A).mulVecLin
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_toLin : (@toLin n ‹_› ‹_› _ _ A : (n → R) →ₗ[R] n → R) = Matrix.mulVecLin A :=
  rfl

-- Porting note: is inserting toLinearEquiv here correct?

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.toLin_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
v : n → R
⊢ Eq ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.toLin A).toLinearEquiv v) ((↑A).mulVecLin v)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem toLin_apply (v : n → R) : (toLin A).toLinearEquiv v = Matrix.mulVecLin (↑A) v :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.val_map_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
u : Units (Matrix n n R)
⊢ Eq (↑((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) u)) ((↑u).map ⇑f)
decl:
/-- A ring homomorphism ``f : R →+* S`` induces a homomorphism ``GLₙ(f) : GLₙ(R) →* GLₙ(S)``. -/
@[simps! apply_val]
def map (f : R →+* S) : GL n R →* GL n S := Units.map <| (RingHom.mapMatrix f).toMonoidHom

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_id
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
⊢ Eq (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map (RingHom.id R)) (MonoidHom.id (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_id : map (RingHom.id R) = MonoidHom.id (GL n R) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
i j : n
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (↑((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g) i j) (f (↑g i j))
decl:
@[simp]
protected lemma map_apply (f : R →+* S) (i j : n) (g : GL n R) : map f g i j = f (g i j) := by
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_comp
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq n
inst✝³ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝² : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
T : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CommRing S
inst✝ : CommRing T
f : RingHom T R
g : RingHom R S
⊢ Eq (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map (g.comp f)) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map g).comp (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_comp (f : T →+* R) (g : R →+* S) :
    map (g.comp f) = (map g).comp (map (n := n) f) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_comp_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq n
inst✝³ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝² : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
T : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : CommRing S
inst✝ : CommRing T
f : RingHom T R
g : RingHom R S
x : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n T
⊢ Eq (((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map g).comp (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f)) x) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map g) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_comp_apply (f : T →+* R) (g : R →+* S) (x : GL n T) :
    (map g).comp (map f) x = map g (map f x) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_one
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
⊢ Eq ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) 1) 1
decl:
@[simp]
protected lemma map_one : map f (1 : GL n R) = 1 := by
  ext
  simp only [_root_.map_one, Units.val_one]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_mul
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g h : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) (HMul.hMul g h)) (HMul.hMul ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) h))
decl:
protected lemma map_mul (g h : GL n R) : map f (g * h) = map f g * map f h := by
  ext
  simp only [_root_.map_mul, Units.val_mul]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_inv
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) (Inv.inv g)) (Inv.inv ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g))
decl:
protected lemma map_inv (g : GL n R) : map f g⁻¹ = (map f g)⁻¹ := by
  ext
  simp only [_root_.map_inv, coe_units_inv]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_det
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g)) ((Units.map ↑f) (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det g))
decl:
protected lemma map_det (g : GL n R) : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det (map f g) =
    Units.map f (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det g) := by
  ext
  simp only [map, RingHom.mapMatrix_apply, Units.inv_eq_val_inv, Matrix.coe_units_inv,
    Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.val_det_apply, Units.coe_map, MonoidHom.coe_coe]
  exact Eq.symm (RingHom.map_det f g.1)

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_mul_map_inv
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) (Inv.inv g))) 1
decl:
lemma map_mul_map_inv (g : GL n R) : map f g * map f g⁻¹ = 1 := by
  simp only [map_inv, mul_inv_cancel]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map_inv_mul_map
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) (Inv.inv g)) ((Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.map f) g)) 1
decl:
lemma map_inv_mul_map (g : GL n R) : map f g⁻¹ * map f g = 1 := by
  simp only [map_inv, inv_mul_cancel]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_map_mul_map_inv
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul ((↑g).map ⇑f) ((Inv.inv ↑g).map ⇑f)) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma coe_map_mul_map_inv (g : GL n R) : g.val.map f * g.val⁻¹.map f = 1 := by
  rw [← Matrix.map_mul]
  simp only [isUnits_det_units, mul_nonsing_inv, map_zero, _root_.map_one, Matrix.map_one]

name: Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.coe_map_inv_mul_map
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
S : Type u_1
inst✝ : CommRing S
f : RingHom R S
g : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul ((Inv.inv ↑g).map ⇑f) ((↑g).map ⇑f)) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma coe_map_inv_mul_map (g : GL n R) : g.val⁻¹.map f * g.val.map f = 1 := by
  rw [← Matrix.map_mul]
  simp only [isUnits_det_units, nonsing_inv_mul, map_zero, _root_.map_one, Matrix.map_one]

name: Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.coeToGL_det
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : CommRing R
g : Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det (Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGL g)) 1
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coeToGL_det (g : SpecialLinearGroup n R) :
    Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det (g : GL n R) = 1 :=
  Units.ext g.prop

name: Matrix.mem_glpos
initialProofState:
n : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
A : Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup n R
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Matrix.GLPos n R) A) (LT.lt 0 ↑(Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det A))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_glpos (A : GL n R) : A ∈ GLPos n R ↔ 0 < (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det A : R) :=
  Iff.rfl

name: Matrix.GLPos.det_ne_zero
initialProofState:
n : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
A : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.GLPos n R) x
⊢ Ne (↑↑A).det 0
decl:
theorem GLPos.det_ne_zero (A : GLPos n R) : ((A : GL n R) : Matrix n n R).det ≠ 0 :=
  ne_of_gt A.prop

name: Matrix.GLPos.coe_neg_GL
initialProofState:
n : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
inst✝ : Fact (Even (Fintype.card n))
g : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.GLPos n R) x
⊢ Eq (↑(Neg.neg g)) (Neg.neg ↑g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem GLPos.coe_neg_GL (g : GLPos n R) : ↑(-g) = -(g : GL n R) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GLPos.coe_neg
initialProofState:
n : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
inst✝ : Fact (Even (Fintype.card n))
g : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.GLPos n R) x
⊢ Eq (↑↑(Neg.neg g)) (Neg.neg ↑↑g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem GLPos.coe_neg (g : GLPos n R) : (↑(-g) : GL n R) = -((g : GL n R) : Matrix n n R) :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.GLPos.coe_neg_apply
initialProofState:
n : Type u
R : Type v
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
inst✝ : Fact (Even (Fintype.card n))
g : Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Matrix.GLPos n R) x
i j : n
⊢ Eq (↑↑(Neg.neg g) i j) (Neg.neg (↑↑g i j))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem GLPos.coe_neg_apply (g : GLPos n R) (i j : n) :
    ((↑(-g) : GL n R) : Matrix n n R) i j = -((g : GL n R) : Matrix n n R) i j :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos_injective
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
⊢ Function.Injective ⇑Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos
decl:
theorem toGLPos_injective : Function.Injective (toGLPos : SpecialLinearGroup n R → GLPos n R) :=
  -- Porting note: had to rewrite this to hint the correct types to Lean
  -- (It can't find the coercion GLPos n R → Matrix n n R)
  Function.Injective.of_comp
    (f := fun (A : GLPos n R) ↦ ((A : GL n R) : Matrix n n R))
    (show Function.Injective (_ ∘ (toGLPos : SpecialLinearGroup n R → GLPos n R))
      from Subtype.coe_injective)

name: Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.coe_GLPos_coe_GL_coe_matrix
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
g : Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq ↑↑(Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos g) ↑g
decl:
/-- Coercing a `Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup` via `GL_pos` and `GL` is the same as coercing straight to
a matrix. -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_GLPos_coe_GL_coe_matrix (g : SpecialLinearGroup n R) :
    (↑(↑(↑g : GLPos n R) : GL n R) : Matrix n n R) = ↑g :=
  rfl

name: Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.coe_to_GLPos_to_GL_det
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝² : DecidableEq n
inst✝¹ : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
g : Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det ↑(Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos g)) 1
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_to_GLPos_to_GL_det (g : SpecialLinearGroup n R) :
    Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup.det ((g : GLPos n R) : GL n R) = 1 :=
  Units.ext g.prop

name: Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.coe_GLPos_neg
initialProofState:
n : Type u
inst✝³ : DecidableEq n
inst✝² : Fintype n
R : Type v
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedCommRing R
inst✝ : Fact (Even (Fintype.card n))
g : Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup n R
⊢ Eq (Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos (Neg.neg g)) (Neg.neg (Matrix.SpecialLinearGroup.toGLPos g))
decl:
@[norm_cast]
theorem coe_GLPos_neg (g : SpecialLinearGroup n R) : ↑(-g) = -(↑g : GLPos n R) :=
  Subtype.ext <| Units.ext rfl
